sentences.sContent: I hate to disillusion you, but I don’t think she’s coming back.
sentences.sCn: 我真不愿意让你失望，但我想她是不会回来了。

sentences.sContent: There is disillusion with established political parties.
sentences.sCn: 对各个确立的政党有幻灭感。

trans.tranOther: to make someone realize that something which they thought was true or good is not really true or good
